TextLibrary.Text: Jarl
So you are a thief, hmmm?
So you are a thief, hmmm?
So you are a thief, hmmm?
So you are a thief, hmmm?
No I'm not. But, as I understand it, you want something returned, not stolen.
No I'm not. But, as I understand it, you want something returned, not stolen.
No I'm not. But, as I understand it, you want something returned, not stolen.
No I'm not. But, as I understand it, you want something returned, not stolen.
Hah! You are wise, little man. But wisdom and words mean nothing, when you face a dangerous task.
Hah! You are wise, little man. But wisdom and words mean nothing, when you face a dangerous task.
Hah! You are wise, little girl. But wisdom and words mean nothing, when you face a dangerous task.
Hah! You are wise, little girl. But wisdom and words mean nothing, when you face a dangerous task.
What do you mean?
What do you mean?
What do you mean?
What do you mean?
Jotun, Lord of the Fire Giants, has stolen my Hammer. I want it back. It does not matter whether you are stealing it or returning it, you will still have to fight for it.
